data.title: Newhaven ferry, compare prices, times and book tickets
data.meta_description: With directferries.co.uk you can view Newhaven ferry timetables and prices and book Newhaven ferry tickets online.
data.text:
Newhaven Guide

Newhaven Ferry

Is there a ferry from Newhaven?

DFDS Seaways provide Newhaven ferries connecting England, UK with 1 destination. Ferries from Newhaven sail approximately 2 times a day and up to 13 times a week.

Where can I get a ferry from Newhaven?

Newhaven ferries sail to Dieppe.

How long is the ferry from Newhaven?

Ferries sailing from Newhaven can range between 4h 0m and 6h 0m. Ferry times can change from season to season.

What is the fastest ferry from Newhaven?

The fastest ferry from Newhaven is on the Newhaven - Dieppe ferry in 4h 0m with Transmanche Ferries.

Popular routes from Newhaven

Ferries from Newhaven - Dieppe sail approximately 14 times per week with a crossing time of 4h 23m. The average price of a Newhaven - Dieppe ferry is about £178.6.

How much do ferries from Newhaven cost?

Ferry price from Newhaven can range between £46.01 and £410.00 depending on various factors such as the route, season, operator and type of ship.

Is there a car ferry from Newhaven?

Yes, you can take a car ferry from Newhaven with DFDS Seaways. For more information on routes and car ferry prices view our Deal Finder.

Are foot passengers allowed on ferries from Newhaven?

Foot Passengers are allowed on ferries from Newhaven. You can travel as a foot passenger from Newhaven with DFDS Seaways.

Can I take my pet on the ferry from Newhaven?

You can take your pet on the ferry from Newhaven with DFDS Seaways. For more information about pet accommodation and fees please view our Deal Finder.

Can I book a cabin on ferries from Newhaven?

Cabins are available on some ferry routes from Newhaven. Operators that have cabins on ferries from Newhaven include DFDS Seaways. Check our Deal Finder for the best option for you.

Newhaven Port Facilities

At the Newhaven ferry port, you can find basic facilities such as a café, a lounge area, showers and disabled toilets. Short and long-term parking is available in the port in front of the terminal, with overnight parking tickets from £5.00 per day.
